00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief WM8731 audio codec driver for stereo audio output.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief drv_audio.v
00030 */
00031 module drv_audio(
00032     //% \name Clock and reset

00033     //% @{
00034     input       clk_12,
00035     input       reset_n,
00036     //% @}
00037     
00038     //% \name drv_audio interface

00039     //% @{
00040     input [5:0] volume0,
00041     input [5:0] volume1,
00042     input [5:0] volume2,
00043     input [5:0] volume3,
00044     input [7:0] sample0,
00045     input [7:0] sample1,
00046     input [7:0] sample2,
00047     input [7:0] sample3,
00048     //% @}
00049     
00050     //% \name WM8731 audio codec hardware interface

00051     //% @{
00052     output      ac_sclk,
00053     inout       ac_sdat,
00054     output      ac_xclk,
00055     output reg  ac_bclk,
00056     output      ac_dat,
00057     output reg  ac_lr
00058     //% @}
00059 );
00060 
00061 //clock domain switch
00062 reg [5:0] volume0a;
00063 reg [5:0] volume1a;
00064 reg [5:0] volume2a;
00065 reg [5:0] volume3a;
00066 reg [7:0] sample0a;
00067 reg [7:0] sample1a;
00068 reg [7:0] sample2a;
00069 reg [7:0] sample3a;
00070 
00071 always @(posedge clk_12) begin
00072     volume0a <= volume0;
00073     volume1a <= volume1;
00074     volume2a <= volume2;
00075     volume3a <= volume3;
00076     sample0a <= sample0;
00077     sample1a <= sample1;
00078     sample2a <= sample2;
00079     sample3a <= sample3;
00080 end
00081 
00082 reg [5:0] volume0f;
00083 reg [5:0] volume1f;
00084 reg [5:0] volume2f;
00085 reg [5:0] volume3f;
00086 reg [7:0] sample0f;
00087 reg [7:0] sample1f;
00088 reg [7:0] sample2f;
00089 reg [7:0] sample3f;
00090 
00091 always @(posedge clk_12) begin
00092     volume0f <= volume0a;
00093     volume1f <= volume1a;
00094     volume2f <= volume2a;
00095     volume3f <= volume3a;
00096     sample0f <= sample0a;
00097     sample1f <= sample1a;
00098     sample2f <= sample2a;
00099     sample3f <= sample3a;
00100 end
00101 
00102 
00103 assign ac_dat = left_right_sample[31];
00104 assign ac_xclk = clk_12;
00105 
00106 // left MSB-LSB, right MSB-LSB
00107 reg [31:0] left_right_sample;
00108 reg [7:0] data_counter;
00109 
00110 wire [13:0] mult_left_1;
00111 assign mult_left_1 =
00112     ((volume1f[0] == 1'b1)? { {6{sample1f[7]}}, sample1f[7:0] } : 14'd0) +
00113     ((volume1f[1] == 1'b1)? { {5{sample1f[7]}}, sample1f[7:0], 1'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00114     ((volume1f[2] == 1'b1)? { {4{sample1f[7]}}, sample1f[7:0], 2'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00115     ((volume1f[3] == 1'b1)? { {3{sample1f[7]}}, sample1f[7:0], 3'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00116     ((volume1f[4] == 1'b1)? { {2{sample1f[7]}}, sample1f[7:0], 4'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00117     ((volume1f[5] == 1'b1)? { {1{sample1f[7]}}, sample1f[7:0], 5'b0 } : 14'd0);
00118 
00119 wire [13:0] mult_left_2;
00120 assign mult_left_2 =
00121     ((volume2f[0] == 1'b1)? { {6{sample2f[7]}}, sample2f[7:0] } : 14'd0) +
00122     ((volume2f[1] == 1'b1)? { {5{sample2f[7]}}, sample2f[7:0], 1'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00123     ((volume2f[2] == 1'b1)? { {4{sample2f[7]}}, sample2f[7:0], 2'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00124     ((volume2f[3] == 1'b1)? { {3{sample2f[7]}}, sample2f[7:0], 3'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00125     ((volume2f[4] == 1'b1)? { {2{sample2f[7]}}, sample2f[7:0], 4'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00126     ((volume2f[5] == 1'b1)? { {1{sample2f[7]}}, sample2f[7:0], 5'b0 } : 14'd0);
00127 
00128 wire [13:0] mult_right_0;
00129 assign mult_right_0 =
00130     ((volume0f[0] == 1'b1)? { {6{sample0f[7]}}, sample0f[7:0] } : 14'd0) +
00131     ((volume0f[1] == 1'b1)? { {5{sample0f[7]}}, sample0f[7:0], 1'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00132     ((volume0f[2] == 1'b1)? { {4{sample0f[7]}}, sample0f[7:0], 2'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00133     ((volume0f[3] == 1'b1)? { {3{sample0f[7]}}, sample0f[7:0], 3'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00134     ((volume0f[4] == 1'b1)? { {2{sample0f[7]}}, sample0f[7:0], 4'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00135     ((volume0f[5] == 1'b1)? { {1{sample0f[7]}}, sample0f[7:0], 5'b0 } : 14'd0);
00136     
00137 wire [13:0] mult_right_3;
00138 assign mult_right_3 =
00139     ((volume3f[0] == 1'b1)? { {6{sample3f[7]}}, sample3f[7:0] } : 14'd0) +
00140     ((volume3f[1] == 1'b1)? { {5{sample3f[7]}}, sample3f[7:0], 1'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00141     ((volume3f[2] == 1'b1)? { {4{sample3f[7]}}, sample3f[7:0], 2'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00142     ((volume3f[3] == 1'b1)? { {3{sample3f[7]}}, sample3f[7:0], 3'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00143     ((volume3f[4] == 1'b1)? { {2{sample3f[7]}}, sample3f[7:0], 4'b0 } : 14'd0) +
00144     ((volume3f[5] == 1'b1)? { {1{sample3f[7]}}, sample3f[7:0], 5'b0 } : 14'd0);
00145 
00146 wire [14:0] left_channel;
00147 assign left_channel = { mult_left_1[13], mult_left_1 } + { mult_left_2[13], mult_left_2 };
00148 
00149 wire [14:0] right_channel;
00150 assign right_channel = { mult_right_0[13], mult_right_0 } + { mult_right_3[13], mult_right_3 };
00151 
00152 /* Butterworth second order low-pass filter, cut-off = 3.3 kHz, sampling rate = 48 kHz
00153     y_n =
00154             1.4014      y_n1
00155             -0.5432     y_n2
00156             0.0354      x_n
00157             0.0709      x_n1
00158             0.0354      x_n2
00159     Coefficients * 2^14:
00160             1.4014  ->  22961           =   1.01100110110001
00161             -0.5432 ->  -8900           =  -0.10001011000100
00162             0.0354  ->  580             =   0.10010001000000
00163             0.0709  ->  1162            =   0.10010001010000
00164             0.0354  ->  580             =   0.10010001000000
00165 */
00166 
00167 wire [31:0] lx_n;
00168 assign lx_n = { {3{left_channel[14]}}, left_channel, 14'd0 };
00169 
00170 wire [31:0] rx_n;
00171 assign rx_n = { {3{right_channel[14]}}, right_channel, 14'd0 };
00172 
00173 reg [31:0] ly_n1;
00174 reg [31:0] ly_n2;
00175 reg [31:0] lx_n1;
00176 reg [31:0] lx_n2;
00177 
00178 reg [31:0] ry_n1;
00179 reg [31:0] ry_n2;
00180 reg [31:0] rx_n1;
00181 reg [31:0] rx_n2;
00182 
00183 wire [31:0] minus_ly_n2;
00184 assign minus_ly_n2 = -ly_n2;
00185 
00186 wire [31:0] ly_n;
00187 assign ly_n = 
00188     ly_n1 +
00189     { {2{ly_n1[31]}}, ly_n1[31:2] } +
00190     { {3{ly_n1[31]}}, ly_n1[31:3] } +
00191     { {6{ly_n1[31]}}, ly_n1[31:6] } +
00192     { {7{ly_n1[31]}}, ly_n1[31:7] } +
00193     { {9{ly_n1[31]}}, ly_n1[31:9] } +
00194     { {10{ly_n1[31]}}, ly_n1[31:10] } +
00195     { {14{ly_n1[31]}}, ly_n1[31:14] } +
00196     
00197     { {1{minus_ly_n2[31]}}, minus_ly_n2[31:1] } +
00198     { {5{minus_ly_n2[31]}}, minus_ly_n2[31:5] } +
00199     { {7{minus_ly_n2[31]}}, minus_ly_n2[31:7] } +
00200     { {8{minus_ly_n2[31]}}, minus_ly_n2[31:8] } +
00201     { {13{minus_ly_n2[31]}}, minus_ly_n2[31:13] } +
00202     { {14{minus_ly_n2[31]}}, minus_ly_n2[31:14] } +
00203     
00204     { {5{lx_n[31]}}, lx_n[31:5] } +
00205     { {8{lx_n[31]}}, lx_n[31:8] } +
00206     { {12{lx_n[31]}}, lx_n[31:12] } +
00207     { {14{lx_n[31]}}, lx_n[31:14] } +
00208     
00209     { {4{lx_n1[31]}}, lx_n1[31:4] } +
00210     { {7{lx_n1[31]}}, lx_n1[31:7] } +
00211     { {11{lx_n1[31]}}, lx_n1[31:11] } +
00212     { {14{lx_n1[31]}}, lx_n1[31:14] } +
00213     
00214     { {5{lx_n2[31]}}, lx_n2[31:5] } +
00215     { {8{lx_n2[31]}}, lx_n2[31:8] } +
00216     { {12{lx_n2[31]}}, lx_n2[31:12] } +
00217     { {14{lx_n2[31]}}, lx_n2[31:14] };
00218 
00219 wire [31:0] minus_ry_n2;
00220 assign minus_ry_n2 = -ry_n2;
00221 
00222 wire [31:0] ry_n;
00223 assign ry_n = 
00224     ry_n1 +
00225     { {2{ry_n1[31]}}, ry_n1[31:2] } +
00226     { {3{ry_n1[31]}}, ry_n1[31:3] } +
00227     { {6{ry_n1[31]}}, ry_n1[31:6] } +
00228     { {7{ry_n1[31]}}, ry_n1[31:7] } +
00229     { {9{ry_n1[31]}}, ry_n1[31:9] } +
00230     { {10{ry_n1[31]}}, ry_n1[31:10] } +
00231     { {14{ry_n1[31]}}, ry_n1[31:14] } +
00232     
00233     { {1{minus_ry_n2[31]}}, minus_ry_n2[31:1] } +
00234     { {5{minus_ry_n2[31]}}, minus_ry_n2[31:5] } +
00235     { {7{minus_ry_n2[31]}}, minus_ry_n2[31:7] } +
00236     { {8{minus_ry_n2[31]}}, minus_ry_n2[31:8] } +
00237     { {13{minus_ry_n2[31]}}, minus_ry_n2[31:13] } +
00238     { {14{minus_ry_n2[31]}}, minus_ry_n2[31:14] } +
00239     
00240     { {5{rx_n[31]}}, rx_n[31:5] } +
00241     { {8{rx_n[31]}}, rx_n[31:8] } +
00242     { {12{rx_n[31]}}, rx_n[31:12] } +
00243     { {14{rx_n[31]}}, rx_n[31:14] } +
00244     
00245     { {4{rx_n1[31]}}, rx_n1[31:4] } +
00246     { {7{rx_n1[31]}}, rx_n1[31:7] } +
00247     { {11{rx_n1[31]}}, rx_n1[31:11] } +
00248     { {14{rx_n1[31]}}, rx_n1[31:14] } +
00249     
00250     { {5{rx_n2[31]}}, rx_n2[31:5] } +
00251     { {8{rx_n2[31]}}, rx_n2[31:8] } +
00252     { {12{rx_n2[31]}}, rx_n2[31:12] } +
00253     { {14{rx_n2[31]}}, rx_n2[31:14] };
00254 
00255 always @(posedge clk_12 or negedge reset_n) begin
00256     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00257         data_counter        <= 8'd0;
00258         left_right_sample   <= 32'd0;
00259         ac_bclk             <= 1'b0;
00260         ac_lr               <= 1'b0;
00261 
00262         ly_n1 <= 30'd0;
00263         ly_n2 <= 30'd0;
00264         lx_n1 <= 30'd0;
00265         lx_n2 <= 30'd0;
00266         ry_n1 <= 30'd0;
00267         ry_n2 <= 30'd0;
00268         rx_n1 <= 30'd0;
00269         rx_n2 <= 30'd0;
00270     end
00271     else if(data_counter == 8'd0 && state == S_READY) begin
00272         data_counter <= data_counter + 8'd1;
00273         left_right_sample <= { ly_n[29:14],  ry_n[29:14] };
00274         ac_bclk <= 1'b0;
00275         ac_lr <= 1'b1;
00276         
00277         ly_n1 <= ly_n;
00278         ly_n2 <= ly_n1;
00279         lx_n1 <= lx_n;
00280         lx_n2 <= lx_n1;
00281         ry_n1 <= ry_n;
00282         ry_n2 <= ry_n1;
00283         rx_n1 <= rx_n;
00284         rx_n2 <= rx_n1;
00285 
00286     end
00287     else if(data_counter == 8'd1) begin
00288         data_counter <= data_counter + 8'd1;
00289         ac_bclk <= 1'b1;
00290         ac_lr <= 1'b1;
00291     end
00292     else if(data_counter >= 8'd127 && data_counter <= 8'd248) begin
00293         data_counter <= data_counter + 8'd1;
00294         left_right_sample <= { left_right_sample[30:0], 1'b0 };
00295         ac_bclk <= 1'b0;
00296         ac_lr <= 1'b0;
00297     end
00298     else if(data_counter == 8'd249) begin
00299         data_counter <= 8'd0;
00300         ac_bclk <= 1'b0;
00301         ac_lr <= 1'b0;
00302     end
00303     else if(data_counter[1:0] == 2'b11) begin
00304         data_counter <= data_counter + 8'd1;
00305         left_right_sample <= { left_right_sample[30:0], 1'b0 };
00306         ac_bclk <= 1'b0;
00307         ac_lr <= 1'b0;
00308     end
00309     else if(data_counter[1:0] == 2'b01) begin
00310         data_counter <= data_counter + 8'd1;
00311         ac_bclk <= 1'b1;
00312         ac_lr <= 1'b0;
00313     end
00314     else if(data_counter != 8'd0 && state == S_READY) begin
00315         data_counter <= data_counter + 8'd1;
00316     end
00317 end
00318 
00319 reg i2c_start;
00320 reg [15:0] i2c_data;
00321 reg [3:0] state;
00322 
00323 parameter [3:0]
00324     S_IDLE      = 4'd0,
00325     S_RESET     = 4'd1,
00326     S_POWER     = 4'd2,
00327     S_OUTPUT    = 4'd3,
00328     S_SIDE      = 4'd4,
00329     S_EMPH      = 4'd5,
00330     S_FORMAT    = 4'd6,
00331     S_SAMPLING  = 4'd7,
00332     S_ACTIVATE  = 4'd8,
00333     S_READY     = 4'd9; 
00334 
00335 wire i2c_ready;
00336 
00337 i2c_send i2c_send_inst(
00338     .drv_audio(drv_audio),
00339     .drv_audio(drv_audio),
00340     
00341     .drv_audio(i2c_start),
00342     .drv_audio(i2c_data),
00343     .drv_audio(i2c_ready),
00344     
00345     .drv_audio(ac_sclk),
00346     .drv_audio(ac_sdat)
00347 );
00348 
00349 always @(posedge clk_12 or negedge reset_n) begin
00350     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00351         i2c_start <= 1'b0;
00352         i2c_data <= 16'd0;
00353         state <= S_IDLE;
00354     end
00355     else begin
00356         if(state == S_IDLE) begin
00357             i2c_start <= 1'b1;
00358             i2c_data <= 16'b0001111_000000000;
00359             state <= S_RESET;
00360         end
00361         else if(state == S_RESET && i2c_ready == 1'b1) begin
00362             i2c_start <= 1'b1;
00363             i2c_data <= 16'b0000110_001100111; // power down unused parts
00364             state <= S_POWER;
00365         end
00366         else if(state == S_POWER && i2c_ready == 1'b1) begin
00367             i2c_start <= 1'b1;
00368             i2c_data <= 16'b0000010_101111001; // 0dB headphone output
00369             state <= S_OUTPUT;
00370         end
00371         else if(state == S_OUTPUT && i2c_ready == 1'b1) begin
00372             i2c_start <= 1'b1;
00373             i2c_data <= 16'b0000100_011010010; // DAC select
00374             state <= S_SIDE;
00375         end
00376         else if(state == S_SIDE && i2c_ready == 1'b1) begin
00377             i2c_start <= 1'b1;
00378             i2c_data <= 16'b0000101_000000011; // disable mute, 32kHz de-emphasis
00379             state <= S_EMPH;
00380         end
00381         else if(state == S_EMPH && i2c_ready == 1'b1) begin
00382             i2c_start <= 1'b1;
00383             i2c_data <= 16'b0000111_000000011; // DSP mode
00384             state <= S_FORMAT;
00385         end
00386         else if(state == S_FORMAT && i2c_ready == 1'b1) begin
00387             i2c_start <= 1'b1;
00388             i2c_data <= 16'b0001000_000000001; // USB mode, 12MHz, 48 kHz
00389             state <= S_SAMPLING;
00390         end
00391         else if(state == S_SAMPLING && i2c_ready == 1'b1) begin
00392             i2c_start <= 1'b1;
00393             i2c_data <= 16'b0001001_000000001;
00394             state <= S_ACTIVATE;
00395         end
00396         else if(state == S_ACTIVATE && i2c_ready == 1'b1) begin
00397             state <= S_READY;
00398         end
00399         else begin
00400             i2c_start <= 1'b0;
00401         end
00402     end
00403 end
00404 
00405 endmodule
00406 
00407 /*! \brief I2C write helper module.
00408  */
00409 module i2c_send(
00410     input clk_12,
00411     input reset_n,
00412     
00413     input start,
00414     input [15:0] data,
00415     output ready,
00416     
00417     output reg sclk,
00418     inout sdat
00419 );
00420 
00421 assign ready = (state == S_IDLE && start == 1'b0);
00422 assign sdat = (sdat_oe == 1'b0)? 1'bZ : sdat_o;
00423 
00424 reg sdat_oe;
00425 reg sdat_o;
00426 reg [7:0] dat_byte;
00427 reg [1:0] part;
00428 reg [2:0] counter;
00429 reg [3:0] state;
00430 parameter [3:0]
00431     S_IDLE      = 4'd0,
00432     S_SEND_0    = 4'd1,
00433     S_SEND_1    = 4'd2,
00434     S_SEND_2    = 4'd3,
00435     S_SEND_3    = 4'd4,
00436     S_SEND_4    = 4'd5,
00437     S_END_0     = 4'd6,
00438     S_END_1     = 4'd7,
00439     S_END_2     = 4'd8;
00440     
00441 always @(posedge clk_12 or negedge reset_n) begin
00442     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00443         sclk <= 1'b1;
00444         sdat_oe <= 1'b0;
00445         sdat_o <= 1'b1;
00446         dat_byte <= 8'd0;
00447         part <= 2'b0;
00448         counter <= 3'd0;
00449         state <= S_IDLE;
00450     end
00451     else if(state == S_IDLE && start == 1'b1) begin
00452         // start
00453         sdat_oe <= 1'b1;
00454         sdat_o <= 1'b0;
00455         sclk <= 1'b1;
00456         
00457         part <= 2'b0;
00458         dat_byte <= 8'b0011010_0;
00459         counter <= 3'd7;
00460         state <= S_SEND_0;
00461     end
00462     else if(state == S_SEND_0) begin
00463         sdat_oe <= 1'b1;
00464         sdat_o <= dat_byte[7];
00465         sclk <= 1'b0;
00466         state <= S_SEND_1;
00467     end
00468     else if(state == S_SEND_1) begin
00469         sclk <= 1'b1;
00470         
00471         if(counter == 3'd0) state <= S_SEND_2;
00472         else begin
00473             dat_byte <= { dat_byte[6:0], 1'b0 };
00474             counter <= counter - 3'd1; 
00475             state <= S_SEND_0;
00476         end
00477     end
00478     else if(state == S_SEND_2) begin
00479         sdat_oe <= 1'b0;
00480         sclk <= 1'b0;
00481         state <= S_SEND_3;
00482     end
00483     else if(state == S_SEND_3) begin
00484         sclk <= 1'b1;
00485         state <= S_SEND_4;
00486     end
00487     else if(state == S_SEND_4 && sdat == 1'b0) begin
00488         sclk <= 1'b0;
00489         part <= part + 2'b1;
00490         counter <= 3'd7;
00491         
00492         if(part == 2'd0)        dat_byte <= data[15:8];
00493         else if(part == 2'd1)   dat_byte <= data[7:0];
00494         
00495         if(part == 2'd0 || part == 2'd1)    state <= S_SEND_0;
00496         else                                state <= S_END_0;
00497     end
00498     else if(state == S_END_0) begin
00499         sdat_oe <= 1'b1;
00500         sdat_o <= 1'b0;
00501         sclk <= 1'b0;
00502         state <= S_END_1;
00503     end
00504     else if(state == S_END_1) begin
00505         sclk <= 1'b1;
00506         state <= S_END_2;
00507     end
00508     else if(state == S_END_2) begin
00509         // end
00510         sdat_oe <= 1'b0;
00511         state <= S_IDLE;
00512     end
00513 end
00514 
00515 endmodule
